title: VI'S GAUNTLETS, RIOT YOU'RE FORGETTING THEM
body: Riot, I love how you guys made this music video showing all the weapons etc. BUT it is annoying me, however, that Vi's gauntlets are never in there?! Like every single weapon, even Nami's stick.. even a simple Nidalee or Pantheon spear, yet Vi's gauntlets are always forgotten :'( Her gauntlets are the coolest weapons ever.. I am planning on making a 3D printed figurine of her and maybe a keychain of her gloves to  put on my mirror in my car or something. Please attend to this.. Thanks

replies.body:
There definitely aren't
> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OafQAgq9,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-27T15:54:31.858+0000)
>
> all the weapons

Present in the music video, i didn't see darius's axe? No need to start complaining about something so trivial.

I know not all weapons are in THAT video, but regardless. Her fists get forgotten just like swains peg leg etc and gangplanks pistol and alot of others. But her fists are the most epic weapon in the game to many
But they ain't really weapons. They're mechanical gloves.

So LETS SAY I throw a bullet at a tree and wounded the tree. Was the bullet a weapon? Lets just say my dog isn't really a dog, it's a descendant of wolves. Hey i like your thinking we can turn the world around on it's axis by this thinking.
Rivens sword or Riot, (it is actually kind of hard to make out the weapons maybe her sword was there and I just didn't see it idk)
It was in it's full form, but yeah there aren't all weapons, many get forgotten but vi's are among the most epic
